title: Giving you some Me Time - Res Lease in Austin. 1 Beds, 1 Baths
posting_body: **This lease listing is for the garage apartment only, and not the main residence** Why deal with all of the hassle and noise that comes with sharing apt walls in a big complex, when you can enjoy a private, quiet, stand-alone garage apartment for less money?
Open & spacious studio layout with separate kitchen, living, and bedroom areas.
Monthly Rental Rate of $1750 includes all bills paid (up to $225) and internet access.

Located across the street from Mueller Lake Park, the perks of this solar-powered apartment include walking to the weekly Farmer's Market, HEB, community pool, Alamo Drafthouse, and the dozens of restaurants/bars in the ultra-cool and progressive Mueller Development.

Located 10 minutes from both downtown and the University with easy access to I-35, 183, and 290, there is no better spot to access Austin's entertainment district, airport, or the 140 acres of parks, ponds, gardens, and running trails located right outside your door.
An ideal spot for graduate students and single professionals.
There are stairs leading up to the main living space of the apartment.
Credit score of 650, monthly gross income = 3 x rent, or higher to apply.
(Houses, Duplexes, Apartments, Condos, All Areas, All Prices)
PRICES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE DAILY/PICS MAY NOT REFLECT EXACT UNIT
